industry: Transportation, Logistics, Supply Chain and Storage
description:
LX Pantos America, Inc. endeavors to create customer value in various logistics areas, such as project cargo, breakbulk, general cargo, consolidation, door-to-door service, container freight, bonded transportation, customs clearance, delivery, storage, and consulting, through its global networks that aim to reduce customers' logistics cost and provide top-notch services as well as its network systems that connect major ports and airports worldwide. At LX Pantos America, Inc. we look for employees who like a challenge and can leverage your skills and years of experience to drive positive results while ensuring a bright future for yourself and LX Pantos America. If you’re looking for a growth opportunity, join us at LX Pantos America. We are currently searching for a highly motivated Warerhouse Operations Assistant Manager.
CORE ROLES & RESPONSIBILITIES
  • Manage E-commerce field operation WH and transportation.
  • Communicate between any customer and vendor for order and sales fulfillment
  • Enter and process into system any invoices issued to customers
  • Verify and record any invoices received from vendors
  • Monitor and manage customer queries and issues; report to sales management for prompt solution findings as needed
  • Facilitate customer service requests and inquiries with UPS (Claims, Tracking, etc.)
  • Analyze sales KPIs (timely order fulfillment, customer satisfaction, etc.)
  • Support the sales management with administrative tasks (sales quotes, proposals, contracts, agreements, etc.)
  • Keep track and respond to any other ad hoc requests and tasks as assigned

REQUIREMENTS
  • Bachelors Degree in Business Management, Business Administration, or related preferred.
  • Bilingual in English and Korean is required.
  • Minimum 4 years of experience in Logistics Operation or CS Operations
  • Strong interpersonal and communication (verbal and written) skills
  • Ability to work in a fast-paced environment within a team setting
  • Proficient in Microsoft Office (Outlook, Excel, PowerPoint, etc.)


Job Type: Regular, Full time Benefits: Medical, Dental, Vision, Life, STD, LTD, AD&D, 401K, and generous PTOs/paid holidays Job Location: 100% on-site in Long Beach, CA Business Hours: Monday to Friday / 08:30 AM to 5:30 PM
